author: VR Gorilla - Virtual Reality & 360 Videos
description:
*Download JadeVR from the Meta store:* 

https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/jadevr/8392118174200720/

*or from the Pico Store:*

https://store-global.picoxr.com/nl/detail/1/7425602973763551237

Open up your world with JadeVR and turn everyday moments into extraordinary experiences. JadeVR makes it easy and affordable for professionals like you to share immersive VR experiences and bring joy and inspiration to your audience. 

Get access to a carefully curated and ever-growing library of over 200 premium VR videos from around the world. In just minutes, create a personalized playlist that perfectly fits your audience. 

Download videos for offline viewing, and use eye-gaze mode to let your audience select and start videos hands-free, without the need for controllers. You can even sync your selection across as many subscribed headsets as you want. No complicated setups, no technical barriers—just a seamless way to engage and inspire. 

Whether you work in elderly care, education, he
title: JadeVR: Opens up your world (Explainer Video)
